title: AI Chatbots Weigh In: Is Bitcoin Poised to Become a Global Reserve Currency?
description: While some people believe that bitcoin (BTC) could become a global reserve asset, others are skeptical. title: Why is the crypto market down today – Is it the weekend effect or something else?
description: Crypto markets experienced significant declines on June 10, with tokens such as Solana’s SOL, Polygon’s MATIC, and Cardano’s ADA falling by double-digit percentages before partially recovering. title: $5,610,000,000 Fund Manager Says More US Bank Failures Incoming, Warns Liquidity and Liability Crisis Boiling Under the Surface
description:
The chief executive of a $5.61 billion private investment firm warns the crisis in the banking sector is not yet over. title: Ethereum Competitor Solana Witnesses 86% Increase in Monthly Active Addresses in May: Crypto Data Firm Nansen
description:
Ethereum (ETH) competitor Solana (SOL) witnessed an explosion in on-chain activity last month, according to the crypto data firm Nansen. Nansen notes that Solana’s monthly active address count surged by 86% in May, reaching a total of 9.5 million addresses, which ranks third among all chains.
